author: dreiss
msg: erlang: Use Automake SUBDIRS instead of a manual forwarding rule
Previously, lib/erl/Makefile.am would forward rules like "all" and
"clean" to the src subdir by manually invoking a submake.  However,
specifying src as a SUBDIR accomplishes this more easily and also
ensures that other rules like "distclean" work.

author: dreiss
msg: THRIFT-841. Exclude generated php and erlang Makefiles from "make dist"

author: niallp
msg: Remove unnecessary throws throws XmlStreamReaderException from methods (already declares throwing IOException - which XmlStreamReaderException is)
